Personalized product recommendations: Use machine learning algorithms to analyze customer purchase history and suggest products that complement their previous purchases.
Virtual try-on: Allow customers to virtually try on clothes and accessories using augmented reality technology.
In-store pickup: Offer a seamless in-store pickup experience, where customers can order online and pick up their items at a designated area in the store.
Loyalty rewards: Implement a loyalty program that rewards customers for their purchases and encourages them to keep coming back.
Interactive chatbot: Use an interactive chatbot to assist customers with their shopping needs, from product recommendations to order tracking and returns.
